div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 750 Goljamo Konare, c. 19 km. N of Plovdiv, Bulgaria, 1959 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: 245 AR. Pot hoard Thracian Chersonese: 191 hemidr. Parium: 54 hemidr. Disposition: Plovdiv Tsontchev, Annuaire MusNatArchPlovdiv 1960, p. 212 Gerasimov, BIAB 25 (1962), p. 229
